title: Masterfont
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415043135/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415043135/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Masterfont**

'Masterfont' is a large [Israeli](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415043135/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Israel) Type Foundry, founded by [Zvika Rosenberg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415043135/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zvika%20Rosenberg).

URL: [http://www.masterfont.co.il](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415043135/http:/www.masterfont.co.il/ "http://www.masterfont.co.il")
author: William Berkson
